content: tell me about all the customers
SELECT c.firstname, c.lastname, c.email, c.phonenumber FROM athena_db.customers c
tell me about all the customers
SELECT c.firstname, c.lastname, c.email, c.phonenumber FROM athena_db.customers c
tell me about all the customers who placed orders?
SELECT c.customerid, c.lastname, c.email, c.phonenumber FROM athena_db.customers c JOIN athena_db.orders o ON c.customerid = o.customerid
tell me about all the customers
SELECT c.firstname, c.lastname, c.email, c.phonenumber FROM athena_db.customers c
tell me about all the customers who placed orders?
SELECT c.customerid, c.lastname, c.email, c.phonenumber FROM athena_db.customers c JOIN athena_db.orders o ON c.customerid = o.customerid
tell me about all the unique customers who placed orders?
SELECT DISTINCT c.firstname, c.lastname, c.email FROM athena_db.customers c JOIN athena_db.orders o ON c.customerid = o.customerid
tell me about all the customers
SELECT c.firstname, c.lastname, c.email, c.phonenumber FROM athena_db.customers c
tell me about all the customers who placed orders?
SELECT c.customerid, c.lastname, c.email, c.phonenumber FROM athena_db.customers c JOIN athena_db.orders o ON c.customerid = o.customerid
tell me about all the unique customers who placed orders?
SELECT DISTINCT c.firstname, c.lastname, c.email FROM athena_db.customers c JOIN athena_db.orders o ON c.customerid = o.customerid
tell me about all the attributes of customers who placed orders and are there in order_item table. please provide order details as well?

SELECT c.customerid, c.email, c.phonenumber, c.firstname, c.lastname,        o.orderid, o.orderamount, o.orderstatus, o.orderdate,        oi.orderitemid, oi.quantity, oi.unitprice,        p.productid, p.productname, p.price FROM athena_db.customers c JOIN athena_db.orders o ON c.customerid = o.customerid JOIN athena_db.order_items oi ON o.orderid = oi.orderid JOIN athena_db.products p ON oi.productid = p.productid;
tell me about all the customers
SELECT c.firstname, c.lastname, c.email, c.phonenumber FROM athena_db.customers c
tell me about all the customers who placed orders?
SELECT c.customerid, c.lastname, c.email, c.phonenumber FROM athena_db.customers c JOIN athena_db.orders o ON c.customerid = o.customerid
tell me about all the unique customers who placed orders?
SELECT DISTINCT c.firstname, c.lastname, c.email FROM athena_db.customers c JOIN athena_db.orders o ON c.customerid = o.customerid
tell me about all the attributes of customers who placed orders and are there in order_item table. please provide order details as well?

SELECT c.customerid, c.email, c.phonenumber, c.firstname, c.lastname,        o.orderid, o.orderamount, o.orderstatus, o.orderdate,        oi.orderitemid, oi.quantity, oi.unitprice,        p.productid, p.productname, p.price FROM athena_db.customers c JOIN athena_db.orders o ON c.customerid = o.customerid JOIN athena_db.order_items oi ON o.orderid = oi.orderid JOIN athena_db.products p ON oi.productid = p.productid;

tell me the product name, category, price and StockQuantity of products for which the orders were placed along with customer name who placed those orders? concate first name and last name to form customer name?

SELECT   p.productname,   p.category,   p.price,   p.stockquantity,   CONCAT(c.firstname, ' ', c.lastname) AS customer_name FROM   athena_db.products p JOIN   athena_db.order_items oi ON p.productid = oi.productid JOIN   athena_db.orders o ON oi.orderid = o.orderid JOIN   athena_db.customers c ON o.customerid = c.customerid;
tell me about all the customers
SELECT c.firstname, c.lastname, c.email, c.phonenumber FROM athena_db.customers c
tell me about all the customers who placed orders?
SELECT c.customerid, c.lastname, c.email, c.phonenumber FROM athena_db.customers c JOIN athena_db.orders o ON c.customerid = o.customerid
tell me about all the unique customers who placed orders?
SELECT DISTINCT c.firstname, c.lastname, c.email FROM athena_db.customers c JOIN athena_db.orders o ON c.customerid = o.customerid
tell me about all the attributes of customers who placed orders and are there in order_item table. please provide order details as well?

SELECT c.customerid, c.email, c.phonenumber, c.firstname, c.lastname,        o.orderid, o.orderamount, o.orderstatus, o.orderdate,        oi.orderitemid, oi.quantity, oi.unitprice,        p.productid, p.productname, p.price FROM athena_db.customers c JOIN athena_db.orders o ON c.customerid = o.customerid JOIN athena_db.order_items oi ON o.orderid = oi.orderid JOIN athena_db.products p ON oi.productid = p.productid;

tell me the product name, category, price and StockQuantity of products for which the orders were placed along with customer name who placed those orders? concate first name and last name to form customer name?

SELECT   p.productname,   p.category,   p.price,   p.stockquantity,   CONCAT(c.firstname, ' ', c.lastname) AS customer_name FROM   athena_db.products p JOIN   athena_db.order_items oi ON p.productid = oi.productid JOIN   athena_db.orders o ON oi.orderid = o.orderid JOIN   athena_db.customers c ON o.customerid = c.customerid;
tell me about the product which generated maximum revenue?

WITH product_revenue AS (   SELECT     p.productname,     SUM(oi.unitprice * oi.quantity) AS total_revenue   FROM     athena_db.products p     JOIN athena_db.order_items oi ON p.productid = oi.productid     JOIN athena_db.orders o ON oi.orderid = o.orderid   GROUP BY     p.productname ) SELECT   productname,   total_revenue FROM   product_revenue ORDER BY   total_revenue DESC LIMIT 1;
